title: Mother, Daughter Killed, Three Women Wounded
content:
Police named 23-year-old Dontevous Loyd as a suspect in the shooting that killed a woman and a little girl and critically wounded three other women at an Omaha apartment complex. Loyd surrendered to police Tuesday morning.
Officers called to the Bluffs at Cherry Hills Apartments near North 108th Street and Military Road just after 11 p.m. Sunday found 22-year-old Destacia Straughn and 2-year-old Kenacia Amerson-Straughn dead. Twenty-two-year-old Kachelle Roby, 21-year-old Larrion Williams and 18-year-old Jamie Latner were wounded.
Loyd had an active warrant for two counts of first-degree murder, three counts of attempted first-degree murder, five counts of use of a weapon and one count of possession of a gun by a prohibited person.
